law.text: It is unlawful for any person to make or cause to be made, in any document filed with the commissioner or the commissioner's designee or in any proceeding under this chapter, any statement which is, at the time and in the light of the circumstances under which it is made, false or misleading in any material respect.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 873, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 165, sec. 16, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 346, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 110, sec. 13, effective January 1, 1961.
